mods.abstract: RAN AWAY. FROM the undersigned, in Opelousas, about the end of June last, a Negro-woman, named AZELIA, about 20 years old, middle size, speaking both French and English, and living disposition. A liberal reward will be given to person who will bring her back to the undersigned or lodge her in Jail. THEODOSE S. ROBIN. Opelousas, July 11th, 1857.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
